sentences.en: Christian Europe was at a low ebb.
sentences.cn: 信仰基督教的欧洲到了低潮期.

sentences.en: Fishing boats were standing down with the ebb.
His confidence is at a low ebb.
His fortune was beginning to ebb.

sentences.cn: 他的家产渐渐衰落起来.

sentences.en: Linda’s enthusiasm began to ebb away.
My luck is on the ebb.
Private and public virtues were at the lowest ebb.
sentences.cn: 公德与私德均在衰落之中.

sentences.en: Public confidence in the President is at a low ebb.
sentences.cn: 民众对总统的信心在减退.

sentences.en: the country was at a low ebb due to the recent war.
sentences.cn: 由于最近的战争，该国处于衰退期。

sentences.en: The ebb and flow of the sea is certainly a sight to behold.
sentences.cn: 海潮的涨落确实是个奇观.

sentences.en: the ebb and flow of the tide
The ebb has made a good while; our stores should be uncovered.
sentences.cn: 潮水已经退了一阵子, 我们的给养应该露出水面了.

sentences.en: The flood and ebb tides alternates with each other.
The scandal brought his credibility to its lowest ebb.
sentences.cn: 那件丑闻使他的信誉跌到最低点.

sentences.en: The tide is on the ebb , ie is going out.
They swam till the tide began to ebb.
sentences.cn: 他们一直游到开始退潮.

trans.tran_en: the flow of the sea away from the shore, when the tide goes out
if the tide ebbs, it flows away from the shore
if the tide ebbs, it flows away from the shore
